Alter.name: Alter
Alter.description: Grants permission to alter a keyspace or table

Create.name: Create
Create.description: Grants permission to create a keyspace or table

Drop.name: Drop
Drop.description: Grants permission to drop a keyspace or table

Modify.name: Modify
Modify.description: Grants permission to INSERT, UPDATE or DELETE data in a table

Restore.name: Restore
Restore.description: Grants permission to restore table from a backup

Select.name: Select
Select.description: Grants permission to SELECT data from a table

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag a keyspace or table

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag a keyspace or table
